item.title: Should AI Write your Content?
item.description: The other day, I stumbled on a GPT prompt so meticulously crafted it almost felt like software. It had neatly labeled sections and clear instructions. You drop it into ChatGPT or Claude or whatever else you like, and it asks for a topic. Feed it something — say, “B2B SaaS onboarding” — and within minutes, it spits out a 1000-word blog that actually reads like someone gave a damn. A screenshot from ChatGPT response Trim a few lines, tighten the flow, and you’ve got something publishable in half an hour.
